About me

My name is Maxim

Hello. My name is Maxim Kurashkin. I’m web designer and front-end web-developer. I have been studying this for 2 years. So I can design in Figma and code in HTML5 , CSS3 , Scss , Sass , JavaScript. Adaptation for different devices is a must so it is included in price. Also I can make different edits in your sites, for example change photos, make better quality of logo and so on. I know Wordpress. It is not a problem to make site on WP. English and Russian languages know well.

Web-development

In addition to the above, I use Gulp for building projects. All projects are Pixel Perfect.

Developing Applications

I can make different web or mobile applications for your business or anything else.

UI/UX Design

All designs are made in Figma. The only thing you need is to send photos and information and I'll do everything according to preferences!

Skills

What I use

HTML5

This is the skeleton of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized version of your product.

CSS3

This style language allows me to create absolutely any look and feel for your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!

Java Script

This programming language allows you to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, getting data from the server and much more.

Figma

Figma is a cross-platform online service for front-end designers and web developers. The development of interfaces takes place in an online application.

WordPress

WordPress is an open source content management system; written in PHP; database server - MySQL. Scope of application - from blogs to fairly complex news resources.

Gulp

Gulp is a task manager for automatically executing frequently used tasks written in the JavaScript programming language.

Github

GitHub is the largest web service for hosting and developing IT projects.

Bootstrap 5

The CSS framework helps in the arrangement of the blocks of the page, and the creation of the same type of structures

Tilda

Tilda Publishing is a blocky website builder that does not require programming skills. Allows you to create websites, online stores, landing pages, blogs and email newsletters.

Jquery

The Jquery library will speed up development. We will not integrate it without the need to integrate it into the project, but the skill of working with it is present.

React

This library allows you to create web applications. I can create the most interactive product just for your goals

Node.js

This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - "brains" that will perform actions that the user does not see
